Properties.ProtectedString:
local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent
local MouseDownObject = WaitForChild(script, 'MouseDown')
local TargetPosition = WaitForChild(script, 'TargetPosition')
local HoldAniTrack local ThrowAniTrack local ChargeAniTrack local ChargeArmAniTrack
local ChargeUpSound = WaitForChild(WaitForChild(Tool,'Handle'),'ChargeUp') local SonicBoomSound = WaitForChild(WaitForChild(Tool,'Handle'),'SonicBoom')
local ChargeAniBaseLength=4 local MaxChargeSpeed=15
local BaseFire = Instance.new('Fire') BaseFire.Size = 4
local ChargingThrust = false
local function ChargeThrust() ChargingThrust = true local aniSpeed = 5 Spawn(function() while ChargingThrust and MouseDownObject.Value do wait(1/30) end SonicBoomSound:Play() end) ChargeArmAniTrack:Play(0,1,.5) while ChargingThrust and MouseDownObject.Value and aniSpeed<MaxChargeSpeed do ChargeAniTrack:Play(0,1,aniSpeed) ChargeUpSound:Play() wait((ChargeAniBaseLength/aniSpeed)/2) if ChargingThrust then ChargeUpSound:Play() end wait((ChargeAniBaseLength/aniSpeed)/2) aniSpeed=aniSpeed*1.3 end
local tfire1 = BaseFire:Clone() local tfire2 = BaseFire:Clone()
if ChargingThrust and MouseDownObject.Value then tfire2.Parent = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild('Right Leg') tfire1.Parent = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild('Left Leg') end
while ChargingThrust and MouseDownObject.Value do ChargeAniTrack:Play(0,1,aniSpeed) ChargeUpSound:Play() wait((ChargeAniBaseLength/aniSpeed)/2) if ChargingThrust then ChargeUpSound:Play() end wait((ChargeAniBaseLength/aniSpeed)/2) end
game.Debris:AddItem(tfire1,1) game.Debris:AddItem(tfire2,1) end
local function OnMouseDown() if Tool.Enabled then HoldAniTrack:Play() Spawn(ChargeThrust) end end
local function OnMouseUp() if Tool.Enabled then ChargingThrust = false HoldAniTrack:Stop() ChargeArmAniTrack:Stop() ThrowAniTrack:Play() end end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) local MyChar = script.Parent.Parent
HoldAniTrack = MyChar.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool,'HoldAni')) ThrowAniTrack = MyChar.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool,'ThrowAni')) ChargeAniTrack = MyChar.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool,'ChargeUpAni')) ChargeArmAniTrack = MyChar.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool,'ChargeUpArm'))
mouse.TargetFilter=WaitForChild(Tool,'Handle') mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Tool.Enabled and not MouseDownObject.Value then MouseDownObject.Value = true OnMouseDown() end end) mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() if MouseDownObject.Value then wait(0.01) --NOTE: Wait added to fix immediate down-up issue on iPad TargetPosition.Value=mouse.Hit.p --set this early to prevent lag problems MouseDownObject.Value = false OnMouseUp() end end) end
local function OnUnequipped() MouseDownObject.Value = false ChargingThrust = false HoldAniTrack:Stop() ChargeArmAniTrack:Stop() end
-- Also activate when the Action Button is pressed local function OnChildAdded(child) if child.Name == 'ActionButtonData' then child.Changed:connect(function(newValue) local bindable = child:FindFirstChild('GetTargetPosition') if bindable then if string.sub(newValue, 1, 1) == 'v' then -- Button down OnMouseDown() elseif string.sub(newValue, 1, 1) == '^' then -- Button up OnMouseUp() end end end) end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.ChildAdded:connect(OnChildAdded)

--this script modifies this weapon depending on if you have the according gamepass
local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool=script.Parent local Player=Tool.Parent.Parent local Handle=WaitForChild(Tool,'Handle') local Mesh= WaitForChild(Handle,'Mesh')
local RedTexture= WaitForChild(Handle,'RedTextureId')
local MrBombModifierName = 'MrBomb'
local IsGold=WaitForChild(Tool,'IsGoldBomb')
local NormalTexture = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94691681' local MrBombTexture = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=98260356'
local MrBombRedTexture = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=98261349' local NormalRedTexture = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94691735'
local NormalMesh = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94691640' local MrBombMesh = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=98260446'
local NormalIcon = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94690231' local MrBombIcon = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=97923204'
function OnModifierAdded(nmodifier) print('modifier added') if nmodifier.Name == MrBombModifierName then IsGold.Value=true Mesh.TextureId=MrBombTexture Mesh.MeshId=MrBombMesh Tool.TextureId= MrBombIcon RedTexture.Value=MrBombRedTexture Tool.ToolTip= 'Professor Bomb' end end
function OnModifierRemoved(nmodifier) if nmodifier.Name == MrBombModifierName then IsGold.Value=false Mesh.TextureId= NormalTexture Mesh.MeshId=NormalMesh Tool.TextureId= NormalIcon RedTexture.Value=NormalRedTexture Tool.ToolTip= 'Bomb' end end
function OnPlayerChildAdded(nchild) if nchild.Name=='PlayerModifiers' then nchild.ChildAdded:connect(OnModifierAdded) for _,i in pairs(nchild:GetChildren()) do OnModifierAdded(i) end nchild.ChildRemoved:connect(OnModifierRemoved) end end
Player.ChildAdded:connect(OnPlayerChildAdded) if Player:FindFirstChild('PlayerModifiers') then OnPlayerChildAdded(Player['PlayerModifiers']) end

----------------- --| Constants |-- -----------------
local BASE_COOLDOWN = 1 -- Seconds until tool can be used again local THROW_FORCE = 75 local THROW_ANGLE = 1.30899694 --75 degrees...ish local THRUST_SPEED = 100 local BASE_DAMAGE = 45 -------------------- --| WaitForChild |-- --------------------
-- Returns the ancestor that contains a Humanoid, if it exists local function FindCharacterAncestor(subject) if subject and subject ~= Workspace then local humanoid = subject:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then return subject, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(subject.Parent) end end return nil end
-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
----------------- --| Variables |-- -----------------
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players')
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool.Handle
local ClickTransmitterScript = WaitForChild(Tool, 'ClickTransmitter') local MouseDownObject = WaitForChild(ClickTransmitterScript, 'MouseDown') local DoDrop = WaitForChild(ClickTransmitterScript, 'DoDrop') local TargetPosition = WaitForChild(ClickTransmitterScript, 'TargetPosition')
local MouseDownTime = 0 local MouseDownLength = 0
local MyModel = nil local MyPlayer = nil
local ThrustVelocity= Instance.new('BodyVelocity') ThrustVelocity.maxForce=Vector3.new(9999999,0,9999999)
local TouchEnabled = false
local ThrowVelocity= Instance.new('BodyVelocity') ThrowVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(9999999,9999999,9999999) ThrowVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0,THROW_FORCE,0)
local creatorTag = Instance.new('ObjectValue',Tool) creatorTag.Name = 'creator' --NOTE: Must be called 'creator' for website stats
local weaponNameTag = Instance.new('StringValue', creatorTag) weaponNameTag.Name = 'weaponName' weaponNameTag.Value = Tool.Name local weaponIconTag = Instance.new('StringValue', creatorTag) weaponIconTag.Name = 'weaponIcon' weaponIconTag.Value = Tool.TextureId
----------------- --| Functions |-- -----------------
local function ThrowCharacter(hitCharacter) print('throwing character') local throwTorso = hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Torso') local myTorso = MyModel:FindFirstChild('Torso')
if not (throwTorso and myTorso) then return end
local dir = (throwTorso.CFrame.p - myTorso.CFrame.p) dir = Vector3.new(dir.x,0,dir.z).unit local holdMultiplier = math.min(2.5,math.max(MouseDownLength*.8,1)) ThrowVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(math.cos(THROW_ANGLE)*THROW_FORCE*dir.x*holdMultiplier,math.sin(THROW_ANGLE)*THROW_FORCE*holdMultiplier, math.cos(THROW_ANGLE)*THROW_FORCE*dir.z*holdMultiplier) print(ThrowVelocity.velocity) local hitHumanoid= hitCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hitHumanoid then local throwFinished=false ThrustVelocity.velocity=Vector3.new(0,0,0) Spawn(function() while not throwFinished do hitHumanoid.PlatformStand =true wait(1/30) end end) ThrowVelocity.Parent=throwTorso
--Do damage local hitBindable = hitHumanoid:FindFirstChild('Hit') if hitBindable then hitBindable:Invoke(BASE_DAMAGE*math.min(2,math.max(MouseDownLength*.8,1)), creatorTag) else local ntag = creatorTag:Clone() ntag.Parent = hitHumanoid game.Debris:AddItem(ntag,1) hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(BASE_DAMAGE*math.min(2,math.max(MouseDownLength*.8,1))) end
Delay(.1, function() ThrowVelocity.Parent=nil end) Delay(.5,function() throwFinished=true ThrustVelocity.Parent=nil wait(2/30) hitHumanoid.PlatformStand = false end) end end
local function EndThrust()
end
local function OnTouch(part) --print('got to touch') if not TouchEnabled then return end
local hitCharacter = FindCharacterAncestor(part) if hitCharacter and hitCharacter ~= MyModel then ThrowCharacter(hitCharacter) EndThrust() TouchEnabled = false end end
local function ThrustAttack(direction) local torso=WaitForChild(MyModel,'Torso') local humanoid=MyModel:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if Tool.Parent == MyModel and humanoid and torso then ThrustVelocity.velocity=Vector3.new(direction.x,0,direction.z).unit*THRUST_SPEED ThrustVelocity.Parent=torso Delay(.25*math.min(math.max(MouseDownLength,1),3),function() ThrustVelocity.Parent=nil TouchEnabled = false end) end end
local function OnEquipped() MyModel = Tool.Parent MyPlayer = PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(MyModel) creatorTag.Value = MyPlayer end
local function OnUnequipped() MyModel.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 ThrustVelocity.Parent=nil end
local ThrustDirection local cameraPos = WaitForChild(WaitForChild(script.Parent,'CameraTransmitter'),'CameraCFrame') local MouseDown =false local function OnMouseDownChanged(down, targetOverride) local myTorso = MyModel:FindFirstChild('Torso') local myHead = MyModel:FindFirstChild('Head') if not(Tool.Enabled and MyModel and MyModel:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') and myTorso and myHead and MyModel.Humanoid.Health > 0) then return end if down then -- Player just clicked MouseDownTime = tick() MyModel.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 wait(0) MouseDown= true Spawn(function() local bgyro = Instance.new('BodyGyro') bgyro.maxTorque= Vector3.new(9999999,9999999,9999999) bgyro.Parent= myTorso while MouseDown do ThrustDirection =(myHead.CFrame.p-cameraPos.Value.p) ThrustDirection = Vector3.new(ThrustDirection.X,0,ThrustDirection.Z).unit --myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(myTorso.CFrame.p,myTorso.CFrame.p+ThrustDirection) bgyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,0,0),ThrustDirection) wait(1/30) end bgyro:Destroy() end) --ThrustDirection = ((targetOverride or TargetPosition.Value) - MyModel.Torso.CFrame.p).unit else -- Player just released click Tool.Enabled = false MouseDownLength = tick() - MouseDownTime MouseDown = false TouchEnabled = true ThrustAttack(ThrustDirection) MyModel.Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 wait(BASE_COOLDOWN*math.min(math.max(MouseDownLength,1),3))
Tool.Enabled = true end end
-- Also activate when the Action Button is pressed local function OnChildAdded(child) if child.Name == 'ActionButtonData' then child.Changed:connect(function(newValue) local bindable = child:FindFirstChild('GetTargetPosition') if bindable then if string.sub(newValue, 1, 1) == 'v' then -- Button down OnMouseDownChanged(true) elseif string.sub(newValue, 1, 1) == '^' then -- Button up OnMouseDownChanged(false) end end end) end end
-------------------- --| Script Logic |-- --------------------
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) MouseDownObject.Changed:connect(OnMouseDownChanged) Tool.ChildAdded:connect(OnChildAdded) --NOTE: Added for Action Button Handle.Touched:connect(OnTouch)

local myCamera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
while not script:FindFirstChild('CameraCFrame') do wait() end
while true do script.CameraCFrame.Value = myCamera.CoordinateFrame wait() end
